org.ietf.nea.pa.attribute

Interface PaAttributeValueAttributeRequestBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ImAttributeValueBuilder, TransmissionObjectBuilder<ImAttributeValue>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaAttributeValueAttributeRequestBuilderIetf

    public interface PaAttributeValueAttributeRequestBuilder
extends ImAttributeValueBuilder
    Generic builder to build an integrity measurement attribute request attribute value compliant to RFC 5792. It can be used in a fluent way.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PaAttributeValueAttributeRequestBuilder addReferences(AttributeReferenceEntry reference, AttributeReferenceEntry... references)
      Sets the references for the attributes to request.
